text: David Neilson (born 13 March 1949) is an English actor, best known for portraying the role of Roy Cropper in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 1995 onwards. He was born in Loughborough, Leicester, England. ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:People from Leicester
title: David Neilson
